@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Basic implementation for an event emitter. This supplies a basic and
minimalistic event mechanism.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Static storage for all event listener

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Attach a listener to the event emitter. The given name will define the type of event. Handing in a '*' will listen to all events emitted by the event emitter.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} An unique id for the attached listener.
@return.description: An unique id for the attached listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Attach a listener to the event emitter which will be executed only once. The given name will define the type of event. Handing in a '*' will listen to all events emitted by the event emitter.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} An unique id for the attached listener.
@return.description: An unique id for the attached listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove a listener from the event emitter. The given name will define the type of event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} The listener's id if it was removed or null if it wasn't found
@return.description: The listener's id if it was removed or null if it wasn't found

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the listener identified by the given id. The id will be return on attaching the listener and can be stored for removing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: id {Integer} The id of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} The listener's id if it was removed or null if it wasn't found
@return.description: The listener's id if it was removed or null if it wasn't found

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} An unique id for the attached listener.
@return.description: An unique id for the attached listener.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} An unique id for the attached listener.
@return.description: An unique id for the attached listener.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to listen to.
@param.description: The name of the event to listen to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Function} The function execute on {@link #emit}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ctx {var?Window} The context of the listener.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: id {Integer} The id of the listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Emits an event with the given name. The data will be passed
to the listener.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event to emit.
@param.description: The name of the event to emit.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {var?undefined} The data which should be passed to the listener.
@param.description: The data which should be passed to the listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Map} A map which has the event name as key. The values are
arrays containing a map with 'listener' and 'ctx'.
@return.description:
A map which has the event name as key. The values are
arrays containing a map with 'listener' and 'ctx'.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns the data entry for a given event id. If the entry could
not be found, undefined will be returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: id {Number} The listeners id

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Internal helper which will return the storage for the given name.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the event.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Array} An array which is the storage for the listener and
the given event name.
@return.description:
An array which is the storage for the listener and
the given event name.
